txt.en: Tolwin is having difficulty leading the people of Crithost. Many matters need his council and many wounded and frightened folk are in dire need of assistance.
Tolwin can be found in the hall of Crithost.\n\nYou should speak with Tolwin.

'The spirits of those in the village are already lifted thanks to you. You have certainly lifted my spirits in the short time you've been in Crithost.\n\n'Were you as much a leader when you were of my age?'

'I am not sure where best to put my time in all these matters. You must be experienced in dealing with all kinds of people across these lands. Perhaps you would be a better guide to these people than I would.

'I cannot think straight while my mother might still be alive out there. She is all the family I may have left...

'Will you help look after the people of Crithost? The wounded rest in this hall while some farmers outside could use some guidance. They need someone strong to look up to.'
Distressed refugees can be found in Crithost.\n\nYou should calm the refugees.
Ailing farmers can be found in the hall at Crithost.\n\nYou should tend to the wounded.
